title: Health Care Workers Hit Hard by the Coronavirus Pandemic
description: Vaccines may be on the way, but many on the front-lines are burned out. Has the government done enough to help alleviate their stress?

title: AstraZeneca’s Vaccine Does Not Work Well Against Virus Variant in South Africa
description: The bad news, coming nearly a week after a million doses of the AstraZeneca-Oxford vaccine arrived in South Africa, was a big setback for the country.

title: Facebook says it plans to remove posts with false vaccine claims.
description: The move, which applies to anti-vaccine posts unrelated to Covid as well, targets unpaid posts to the site and particularly Facebook pages and groups.
